article_title: In Red States, Pressure Mounts To Expand Medicaid Under Obamacare

article_metadata.description: The election of a Democrat to the Louisiana governorship clears the way for yet another Republican-leaning state to expand the Medicaid program for poor Americans under the Affordable Care Act. Already, 31 states have expanded Medicaid including five states led by Republican governors who are working with the Obama administration on [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
